summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2841, for the improvement of East 41st Street, from 45th Avenue Northeast to 55th Avenue Northeast; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues all in the City of Seattle, by constructing concrete sidewalks, concrete stairways, concrete and armored curbs, and providing for the necessary surface drainage, under Ordinance No. 34280 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
